attributes.action: Defer all benefits for immigrants until they have paid national insurance contributions for 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aside from emergency medical treatment, i propose that ALL benefits be defered until national insurance contributions have been paid for 5years. Hard working immigrants looking for a better life wouldn't be put off by this and would be welcome additions to society. Health tourists and the work shy would be discouraged, easing the pressure on housing, the NHS,schools and almost every other public service.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
